name: Talisman of Ascension
active: Ascension: Grant nearby allies 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds (60 second cooldown).
description: Item that provides Health, Ability Haste, Attack Damage, Ability Power, Ability Haste. Active effect: Grant nearby allies 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds (60 second cooldown).. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: The movement speed helps with roaming and map presence
Great for champions who need to reposition frequently in fights
Helps with both engaging and disengaging from unfavorable situations
Excellent for frontline champions who need to absorb damage
Build this when facing heavy mixed damage compositions
